metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000201 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: ruby-ffi version 1.9.23 and earlier has a DLL loading issue which can behijacked on Windows OS, when a Symbol is used as DLL name instead of aString This vulnerability appears to have been fixed in v1.9.24 and later.

criterions.comment: ruby-ffi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
